articles.author: Nicolás Rivero
articles.title: New EV features for Google Maps have arrived. Here’s how to use them. - The Washington Post
articles.description: New Google Maps features address one of Americans’ top concerns about owning an electric car: finding a place to charge.
articles.content:
Google hasannounced new features in its Maps app designed to help electric car drivers find a charge.
The updates include a tool to help drivers find nearby chargers with real-time information about… [+2744 chars]

articles.author: John Barr
articles.title: Report - Larry Nassar victims to get $100M from Justice Dept. - ESPN
articles.description: The U.S. Justice Department has agreed to pay around 100 victims of Larry Nassar approximately $100 million for the FBI's failures to properly investigate reports of Nassar's sexual assaults against America's top gymnasts, according to a report.
articles.content: The United States Justice Department has agreed to pay around 100 victims of disgraced former Team USA doctor Larry Nassar approximately $100 million for the FBI's failures to properly investigate re… [+2837 chars]
